channel.title: Project sony aka black pearl v2
channel.description: hey i got project sony aka black pearl v2 but as you may know or may not know when you attack an npc or player it doe's not attack the npc or player with a movement so it only hit's but doe's not show it attacks. can someone help me witht his give a tut on how to do this? c&p would be GReat thx alot also how do i make the login interface change so the text doe's not keep saying welcome to project sony[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 08:07:01 pm[/size][hr]any one can help me???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 08:08:29 pm[/size][hr]????????????

item.title: Project sony aka black pearl v2

item.description:
@lolig wrote:

hey i got project sony aka black pearl v2
but as you may know or may not know when you attack an npc or player it doe’s not attack the npc or player with a movement so it only hit’s but doe’s not show it attacks.
can someone help me witht his give a tut on how to do this?
c&p would be GReat
thx alot
also how do i make the login interface change so the text doe’s not keep saying welcome to project sony[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 08:07:01 pm[/size][hr]any one can help me???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 08:08:29 pm[/size][hr]???
